Method Detail

reWatchOnExpire

public static ZKClient reWatchOnExpire(ZKClient client)
Creates a ZKClient that will perform auto re-watch on all existing watches when reconnection happens after session expiration. All Watchers set through the returned ZKClient would not receive any connection events.

Parameters:
client - The ZKClient for operations delegation.
Returns:
A ZKClient that will do auto re-watch on all methods that accept a Watcher upon session expiration.

retryOnFailure

public static ZKClient retryOnFailure(ZKClient client,
                                      RetryStrategy retryStrategy)
Creates a ZKClient that will retry interim failure (e.g. connection loss, session expiration) based on the given RetryStrategy.

Parameters:
client - The ZKClient for operations delegation.
retryStrategy - The RetryStrategy to be invoke when there is operation failure.
Returns:
A ZKClient.

namespace

public static ZKClient namespace(ZKClient zkClient,
                                 String namespace)
